How many people are affected by Beare-Stevenson cutis gyrata syndrome ?,Beare-Stevenson cutis gyrata syndrome is a rare genetic disorder; its incidence is unknown. Fewer than 20 people with this condition have been reported worldwide.,GHR,Beare-Stevenson cutis gyrata syndrome
